methods: synchronized CookieSpec getCookieSpec(String name) Gets the cookie specification with the given name.
synchronized CookieSpec getCookieSpec(String name, HttpParams params) Gets the cookie specification with the given ID.
synchronized List<String> getSpecNames() Obtains a list containing names of all registered cookie specs in their default order.
synchronized void register(String name, CookieSpecFactory factory) Registers a CookieSpecFactory with the given identifier.
synchronized void setItems(Map<String, CookieSpecFactory> map) Populates the internal collection of registered cookie specs with the content of the map passed as a parameter.
synchronized void unregister(String id) Unregisters the CookieSpecFactory with the given ID.
